title: Coronavirus: First sailor on virus-stricken USS Roosevelt dies
description: The outbreak on the ship led to its captain's firing after he pleaded for help in a leaked letter.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images/Smith CollectionImage caption
 File photo of the USS Theodore Roosevelt aircraft carrier
A sailor who was serving aboard the USS Theodore Roosevelt aircraft carrier has become the first on the ship to die from Covid-19, the US Na… [+1594 chars]
